# Documentation Index

Welcome to the documentation. For the most detailed information, please refer to the files under `./docs/llms/`.

To use the MCP server locally:
- `npx @spautz/react-library-template mcp`
- `node ./node_modules/@spautz/react-library-template/dist/mcp/server.js`

## Core Resources
- [Introduction to System](./docs/llms/intro.md): Overview of the system.
- [API Reference](./docs/llms/api.md): Detailed API endpoints.
- [Usage Guide](./docs/llms/usage.md): How to use the tools.

## Other Information
- [FAQ](./faq.md)
